印度一男子强奸19岁女儿并将其斩首 Gorakhpur man arrested for raping, beheading 19-year-old daughter戈勒克布尔一男子奸杀19岁女儿并将其斩首，现已被捕GORAKHPUR: A man was arrested on Saturday for allegedly raping and beheading her 19-year-old daughter in Bathbuzurg village of Gorakhpur.戈勒克布尔：周六，戈勒克布尔Bathbuzurg村一名男子因涉嫌强奸19岁女儿并将其斩首而被捕。The arrest was made on the complaint of the elder daughter of the accused.被告的大女儿报案后，警方将凶手逮捕归案。http://i.santaihu.com/india/2019-08-19/e3e8f136fd25908173e5a6844ce41a31.pngPolice said the accused, Jai Prakash Gupta had been allegedly raping his younger daughter for the last two years. During interrogation, Gupta told the police that on July 26 night, he raped his daughter and beheaded her.警方表示，被告贾伊·普拉卡什·古普塔涉嫌在过去两年多次强奸其小女儿。在审讯过程中，古普塔告诉警方，7月26日晚，他强奸了自己的女儿，并将其斩首。He buried the head in Urwa area of the district and threw the lower part of the body in Kachna Nulla in Harpurbudhat. Police recovered the body on the basis of the information provided by the accused.他把砍下的头颅埋在乌尔瓦地区，把下半身扔在哈普巴德哈特的Kachna Nulla。警方根据被告提供的信息找到了尸体。Gupta admitted that he had been raping his daughter for the last two years.古普塔承认，在过去两年中他多次强奸其女儿。His wife died about 15 years ago and after the marriage of his elder daughter in 2015, Gupta and his younger daughter had been living in the house.古普塔的妻子在15年前去世，2015年大女儿结婚后，古普塔和小女儿一直住在这栋房子里。Senior superintendent of police Sunil Gupta said, "The accused has accepted that he raped and killed his daughter and the police have recovered the body parts. A case of rape and murder has been registered against the accused."高级警司苏尼尔·古普塔称:“被告已经承认奸杀了女儿，警方已经找到了尸体。凶手被控强奸和谋杀罪，已立案。”印度时报读者的评论：译文来源：三泰虎http://www.santaihu.com/48267.html 译者：Jessica.Wu外文：https://timesofindia.indiatimes.comHindustani•19 hours agosad to say.. but its time has come for us ..we hindu need some serious law..this is going out of control悲哀啊，制定严厉的法律吧。强奸这个问题已经失控了。
